title: The Koala brothers
creator_credit: Tobias Fouracre, Spellbound and Famous Flying Films
brief_description: Set in outback Australia, two aeroplane-pilot koala brothers set out to help anyone in need. Other Australian animal friends are also involved in their adventures. “The Koala Brothers” is a puppet-style animated television series suitable for children aged 2 to 6 years old. This DVD contains six episodes approximately 10 minutes each. Narrated by Jonathon ‘Jono’ Coleman.
